0xD TallinnSec at IT College

26th of February, 17.45 at IT college ICO-316

Posted on February 12, 2020
TallinnSec's own event in February from community members to the community.

Place: TalTech IT College, room ICO-316 - 3rd floor (Raja 4c, Tallinn - https://goo.gl/maps/RcD4dASewLGQJsGL9)
Time: 26th of Feb, 17.45

Powered by:

Agenda:

  • 17.45 Gathering & grab a drink
  • 17.55 Introduction by TallinnSec
  • 18.00 "Securing your WP on shared hosting" - Peeter Marvet, Zone
  • 19.00 "Tools for tools, Metatools for open source forensics" - The CinCan project. You can check more about what they'll be doing also at Disobey 2020: here
  • 20.00 "Shitrix hit the fan" by Juho Jauhiainen
  • 21.00 Proxmox cluster / portable VM environments - Osku
  • 22.00 Closing. Potentially continues out of IT College

PS! We are always looking for speakers/workshops/tool reviews etc for all our coming events. If you want to share something awesome with our community contact us at tallinnsecmeetups@gmail.com

Can't wait to see you all there!
TallinnSec team

Find Us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TallinnSec
Find Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tallinnsec/

Stay tuned for our next meetups on our website as well as on TallinnSec meetup page.
